content: It will then start to breathe fire from its mouth as a jet, in which case, you'll want to get behind it and attack. Lastly, you'll see a change in its leap attacks. Wherever it jumps, it will send out small waves of fire in a circle around it. As you see it leaping, dodge and create distance between the two of you to avoid the circle of flames.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Lang_Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Lang_Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Lang-Lang Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It will then start to breathe fire from its mouth as a jet, in which case, you'll want to get behind it and attack. Lastly, you'll see a change in its leap attacks. Wherever it jumps, it will send out small waves of fire in a circle around it. As you see it leaping, dodge and create distance between the two of you to avoid the circle of flames.
